body:
If going to CS3 Extended is to much for you, may also want to give Artizen
HDR a spin. It has shown on many occassions to be far superior to both CS3
and Photomatix and transformation misalignment. That being said CS3 does
have a decent rotation correction alogrithm.


Examples of some tests ppl have performed.
http://www.flickr.com/groups/artizenhdr/discuss/72157594203806778/


Tom
